entries.title: Cheaper hearing aids hit stores today, available over the counter for first time
entries.description: They often cost thousands and by prescription only. Now they're as low as $199 at Walmart.

entries.title: What it takes to re-create Rings of Power title sequence with Chladni figures
entries.description: British science communicator Steve Mould first explored patterns in 2016 viral video.

entries.title: Coinbase users scammed out of $21M in crypto sue company for negligence
entries.description: Nearly 100 users sue Coinbase for allegedly overlooking security flaw.

entries.title: Nvidia’s last-minute 12GB RTX 4080 rebrand will be a pain for GPU makers
entries.description: Nvidia will shoulder at least some of the costs of rebranding all of the GPUs.

entries.title: Discord update adds activities, app directory, and cheaper Nitro subscription
entries.description: For some communities, Discord has become an alternative to social media.

entries.title: Build a shelf-size vintage computer museum made of paper
entries.description: Artist's collection allows mini Apple II, C64, TRS-80—and more—for the cost of paper and ink.

entries.title: Hacker gets discontinued P.T. running on unmodified PS5
entries.description: New method relies on a transfer from a separate jailbroken system.

entries.title: All DisplayPort 2.0 products are now DisplayPort 2.1, VESA says
entries.description: VESA released DisplayPort 2.1 today, but you may already own certified products.

entries.title: It’s the BOAT: Astronomers observe “brightest of all time” gamma-ray burst
entries.description: It's a "once-in-a-century opportunity" to address fundamental questions of these bursts.

entries.title: $399 Razer Edge tries to make Android gaming tablets happen
entries.description: Plus it has Qualcomm's "new" (but actually old) Snapdragon G3x Gen 1 gaming chip.

entries.title: 37-year-old Amiga platform gets updates to Linux kernel, AmigaOS SDK
entries.description: Amiga's big German conference also happened for the first time since COVID.

entries.title: Kanye West to buy Parler, promises to protect “conservative opinions”
entries.description: West's antisemitic posts got him locked out of Twitter and Instagram this month.

entries.title: FedEx abandons its last-mile delivery robot program
entries.description: A human in a FedEx uniform will deliver those packages for the foreseeable future.

entries.title: Rent going up? One company’s algorithm could be why
entries.description: YieldStar helps landlords set prices across the US, likely harming competition.

entries.title: Comcast wanted $210,000 for Internet—so this man helped expand a co-op fiber ISP
entries.description: Fed up with Comcast and AT&T, Silicon Valley residents started their own network.
